titles.title: A resolution regarding the sale of United States agricultural products to the Republic of Cuba.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Urges the President to: (1) lift the embargo on the export of U.S. agricultural products to Cuba; and (2) take appropriate steps to make clear to the Government of Cuba, other nations, and the American people that such action does not represent a change in U.S. policy toward Cuba.
